title: Beverly Hills Estate of Late Billionaire Kirk Kerkorian on the Market for $22M
text:
Published By: Fox News: Lifestyle - Today 
Billionaire businessman Kirk Kerkorian's Beverly Hills mansion is listed for $22 million. The late Kerkorian bought the property in 1998 for...
